????::

The light showed the beast mode that the bot had. It was a fuzzor 
most of his body was a Quetzalcoatlus (one type of Pterosaur), but 
some parts of his beast mode body (like his back, chest and wings) 
had metallic green-blue feathers. His neck was extremely long, his 
slender jaws were toothless and its head was topped by a long, bony 
crest. 

The bot started to screech due the light and for few seconds he cover 
his eyes with his wings, but few minutes later he tried to escape and 
he accidentally cut with his craws one cable and that did that the 
lights turn off in half ship... After he did that he ran away towards 
a dark corridor with out stop to screech.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        "I think I'm okay Starstomp.  I should be able to get this 
fixed 
> before too long."  He reconnects some more cables and the lights 
come on 
> replacing the emergency lights.  "Well, that helps."  He hears a 
noise in the 
> room and looks around.  In the new light he sees the survivor 
standing 
> nearby, eyes glowing.  "I think I found a survivor."  He turns 
around very 
> slowly.  "Hi.  I'm Aerotaur.  And you are?"
